# HashHive

> Distributed password cracking platform orchestrating hashcat across multiple agents with campaign management and real-time monitoring

## Core Documentation

- [README](README.md): Main project documentation and getting started guide
- [Agents Guide](AGENTS.md): AI assistant guidance for working with this codebase
- [Contributing](CONTRIBUTING.md): Contribution guidelines and development workflow
- [Security](SECURITY.md): Security policies, vulnerability reporting, and deployment best practices

## Specifications

- [Product Overview](.kiro/steering/product.md): Core capabilities and target users
- [Project Structure](.kiro/steering/structure.md): Repository layout and naming conventions
- [Technical Stack](.kiro/steering/tech.md): MERN architecture, libraries, and commands

## Implementation Plans

- [System Design](.kiro/specs/mern-migration/design.md): Architecture and data models
- [Migration Requirements](.kiro/specs/mern-migration/requirements.md): Migration requirements from CipherSwarm
- [Task Breakdown](.kiro/specs/mern-migration/tasks.md): Implementation task list
- [Task 1 Summary](.kiro/specs/mern-migration/TASK_1_SUMMARY.md): Project foundation and infrastructure setup completion

## Optional

- [MERN Proposal](docs/MERN_proposal.md): Original migration proposal and rationale
